trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation errors and warnings are encountered in an XML document being validated.
trans-unit.target: Representerer unntak under XML-skjema Definition Language (XSD) skjemavalideringsfeil og advarsler er funnet i et XML-dokument valideres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> klasse Unntaksmelding som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> beskrivelse til feilen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> klasse med den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objektene som er angitt.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles av utledede klassen brukes til å initialisere tilstand i denne typen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objektet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message and original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> klassen med Unntaksmelding og opprinnelig <xref:System.Exception>objektet som dette unntaket som er angitt.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> beskrivelse til feilen.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: Opprinnelige <xref:System.Exception>objektet som dette unntaket.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message specified, and the original <xref:System.Exception> object, line number, and line position of the XML that cause this exception specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> klasse Unntaksmelding som er angitt, og opprinnelige <xref:System.Exception>objektet, linjenummer og linje plasseringen av XML-innholdet som føre til at dette unntaket som er angitt.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> beskrivelse til feilen.

trans-unit.source: The original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: Opprinnelige <xref:System.Exception>objektet som dette unntaket.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: Nummeret på XML-innholdet som dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The line position of the XML that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: Linje plasseringen av XML-innholdet som dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> object with the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> information that contains all the properties of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bygger en ny <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref> objekt med den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>informasjon som inneholder alle egenskapene for den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext></xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Sets the XML node that causes the error.
trans-unit.target: Angir XML-node som forårsaker feilen.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Exception.Source%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Exception.Source%2A>egenskapen i stedet.</xref:System.Exception.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source object.
trans-unit.target: Kildeobjektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML node that caused this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter XML-node som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class, the object returned by the SourceObject property is an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>oppstod under validering av en klasse som implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>grensesnitt som den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>klassen objektet som returneres av egenskapen SourceObject er en forekomst av en klasse som implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation by a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the value of the SourceObject property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>oppstod under validering av en validering <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet, verdien for egenskapen SourceObject er `null`.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The XML node that caused this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-node som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"> </xref>.
